alert.note: Alert for Gila (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 21 at 9:14AM MST until August 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Tonto Creek through Tonto Basin in a portion of east central Arizona, including the following county, Gila. * WHEN...Until 315 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 909 AM MST, the streamflow gauge on Tonto Creek at Roosevelt, upstream from Tonto Basin, reported flow above action stage at 5.98 feet. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in Tonto Creek affecting the low water crossings of A Crossing, Bar X Crossing, and Store Crossing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Tonto Basin and Punkin Center. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
